1.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, Chandler and Joey are playing with the duck and the
chick.

lines.Line:
Hey, wouldn't be cool if our duck and chick had a little baby? We could
call it Chuck

Listen, I-I need a favor. Umm, I was in the shower, and as I was cleansing
myself, I ah, I-I, well I felt something
Was it like a sneeze only better
Was it like a sneeze only better
No, no, I mean, I mean a thing on my body
(with a disgusted look) What was it

Well, I don't know, it's-it's kinda in a place that's not... It's not
visually accessible to me, and I was hoping maybe you guys could-could help me out.
(starts to take off his pants

Come on you guys, it's no big deal! (He turns around and shows him his
thing.

Well what is it? Is it a mole? (He moves closer to them, and they jump
back.
No, it's too wrinkly to be a mole
No, it's too wrinkly to be a mole
No, it's too wrinkly to be a mole
Well, eww. What? Is it a pimple

No, it's... fancier than a pimple. Look Ross, why don't you just go
see a…

(entering, interrupting them) Hey guys! What's... (sees what they're
doing and stops, the guys are stunned
Okay, well, it's definite, two more weeks of winter
Okay, well, it's definite, two more weeks of winter

lines.Character: (Rachel backs out with a confused look on her face
lines.Line: Rachel backs out with a confused look on her face.

2.SceneDescription: A Street, Phoebe is walking with her second date, Jason.

lines.Line:
...and I know I'll never miss doing it, but I gotta tell you, it's pretty
cool knowing that you're making a difference in a kid's life

That is so great! Oh, I... (sees that a parked car near them has caught
on fire) Oh my God
(the fire has worsened) Oh my God!!
Ahh-ahh, we'd better call the fire department

Well, we don't n-n-n-n-need a fireman, we'd, we'd like a good mechanic.
(hears the sound of approaching sirens) Oh my God, here they come! Well, we gotta get out
of here

Well look, if I wanted to see a fireman, I would date one. Okay? (she
drags him away

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Chandler, Monica, and Joey are there.

lines.Line:
(starting to get up) I gotta go water Pete's plants. (stops) Y'know
what, if he's gonna break up with me, maybe I won't water his plants

Well, if he's gonna break up with you, maybe Joey and I should water
his plants. If y'know what I mean
Or ha-ha, we could go over there and pee on them
Or ha-ha, we could go over there and pee on them

(entering with Rachel) …and I-I can't take it! Y'know? I'm just,
always afraid one of them is gonna catch me with the other one. It's making me crazy
Well honey, then why don't you break up with one of them
Whoa-whoa-whoa. What ah, what happened to playing the field

Well, it just, it doesn't feel like playing anymore, it feels like work.
It's like I'm working in the field
So Pheebs, pick one of them
So Pheebs, pick one of them
So Pheebs, pick one of them
Yeah. Which one do you like more

Well, Vince is great, y'know `cause, he's like a guy, guy. Y'know? He's
so burly, he's sooo very burly. (giggles
Okay, good, so there you go. Go with Vince
Okay, good, so there you go. Go with Vince
Well sensitive is important, pick him
Well sensitive is important, pick him
Oh sure, go with the sissy

4.SceneDescription:
Pete's apartment, Monica is there to water the plants, and is showing the gang
around.

lines.Line:
Okay, this is the den. All right, check this out. Lights! (the lights
turn on automatically, but are very bright) Whoa! All right. Less lights! Bad lights!
Lights go away! (they dim) Oh, see you just need to find the right command
Whoa! For a rich guy he's got, that's a pretty small TV

No-no-no, that's a video-phone. But hey guys you're not supposed to be
here, so please, do not touch anything
(sitting down on the couch) I-kea! This is comfortable
(sitting down on the couch) I-kea! This is comfortable
(entering with Phoebe) This place is amazing
God, that is the nicest kitchen
God, that is the nicest kitchen

No! But it's the nicest kitchen, the refrigerator told me to have a
great day
Look at this! A millionaire's checkbook

Joey, put that down! (the phone rings) Oh my God! It's Pete. Okay, get
out!! How the hell do you answer a video-phone! (steps in front of it, and automatically
answers it

Oh it’s umm, good! It's umm, it’s good, just here watering the
plants
Well don't forget that fiches over there by Rachel
(standing up) Ahh... Chandler's on the couch!
(standing up) Ahh... Chandler's on the couch!
I see him, you guys are just the worst hiders ever

Ahh, Pete, the other day when you said you needed to talk, umm, just so
I know, is it good news or bad news

Oh, it's good news. No, it's definitely good news. Hold on a second, I
have another call. (clicks his remote) (to his other call) Hey, how's it going

Ah, no it's not. I've got picture-in-picture here. (to other caller) Yeah.
(listens) Yeah, okay. I'm gonna have to call you back later. (pause) Monica? You. I'm
gonna have to call you back
Oh, oh, okay umm, so I'll see you soon
Oh, oh, okay umm, so I'll see you soon
Okay. Well, it's good news. It's good news
So, what do you thing the good news is
So, what do you thing the good news is

(looking at the checkbook) Wow! Look at this! He wrote a check for 50,000
dollars to Hugo Ligrens Ring Design. (Monica is stunned) Oh, sorry, what do you think the
good news is
Hey, you gotta get Mom on the phone. Call Mom! Call Mom

lines.Character: (Pete's computer automatically calls Mom, Pete's Mom
lines.Line: Pete's computer automatically calls Mom, Pete's Mom.

lines.Character: (Pete's computer automatically calls Mom, Pete's Mom
lines.Line: Pete's computer automatically calls Mom, Pete's Mom.

5.SceneDescription: A Fire House, Phoebe has gone to break up with Vince.

lines.Line: Excuse me. Umm, is Vince here
Yo!! (slides down that pole that fire station’s have
Wow! I didn’t know you guys actually used those.

Umm, wow. This-this isn’t gonna be easy. Umm, I don’t think we
should see each other anymore

No-no it’s okay. It’s just that ah, I thought we had something
pretty special here. And y'know I-I felt like you were someone I could finally open up to,
and… (starts choking up) That there’s so much in me I have to share with you
yet

(starting to cry) I’m sorry, I can’t talk. I’m gonna go
write in my journal. (walks away

6.SceneDescription: Jason’s apartment, Phoebe has gone to break up with Jason.

lines.Character:
(She goes in, and sees Jason without his shirt. It turns out that he has a great body
too, and is at a loss for words
lines.Line:
She goes in, and sees Jason without his shirt. It turns out that he has a great body
too, and is at a loss for words.

So Phoebe, you ah, sounded kinda serious on the phone, is ah, is anything
wrong

7.SceneDescription: Pete’s apartment, Pete and Monica are coming back from a date.

lines.Line:
Lights. (The lights turn on, once again they’re too bright.) Uh,
romantic lights. (The lights dim.
So ah, there was this thing I wanted to talk to you about
Oh, right! I completely forgot about that
Oh, right! I completely forgot about that

Well ah, I’ve been doing a lot of thinking, and I look at my
life

And I feel like I’ve conquered the business world, and I feel like
I’ve conquered the intellectual world, and now I-I have the most beautiful woman in
the world
It’s time for me to conquer the physical world
Monica, I want to become (pause) the Ultimate Fighting Champion

I want to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion! It’s the most
intense physical competition in the world, it’s banned in 49 states

Okay, my trainer, Ho Chi, is teaching me a combination of Gee Koon Doe and
Brazilian street fighting, I’ve even had my own octagon training ring designed
And I suppose you used a ring designer for that

Yeah. Monica, I want you there in the front row when I win. I want you
close enough to smell the blood. What do you think
My parents will be so happy
My parents will be so happy
My parents will be so happy

8.SceneDescription: Guru Saj’s office: Joey and Chandler have taken the duck to see the guru.

lines.Line:
(comforting the duck) Everything’s gonna be all right. Okay,
Dick

(entering) Hello, I am Guru Saj-(sees the duck)-Whoa!! (to Joey)
That’s supposed to be a duck right? ‘Cause otherwise, this is waaay out of my
league

Yeah, yeah. He’s got a, he’s got a really bad cough, and our
vet, he can’t do anything about it. Is there something you can do

Hmm, let me see. Let me see. Do you think you could get him to eat a
bat
